title: Popover of videos on restaurants outside /biz pages
Food name dictionary for better words search
body:
Implement a dictionary of food names to help match with the content, that way we'll have lots more words to search for youtube videos. It's important to measure how many times and the importance of the word in the word into the pages context.

For this, I think will be better use some backend.

title: Detect nationality and adds better tag complement
body: So far, every word or category found on DOM is added by the word 'recipe' for the search, so it searchs by 'burguer recipe' ou 'sandwiches recipe'. But, when word is a nationality, would be better search for 'brazilian food' instead of 'brazilian recipe'.

title: White space on videos stripe when resize window
body:
Resizing window bigger when the video stripe is at end creates a white space on the right.

HOW TO REPRODUCE
- Click "next" button until last video
- Resize window to be bigger

EXPECTED:
The stripe should be adjusted so the last video keeps at right and the white space don't appear.

title: Favorite videos
body: An way to put videos in a favorite list
